
############################################################################################
# File   : Topas-VarianBeamAR.txt
# Name   : Claus E. Andersen
# Created: January 15, 2023
# Revised: January 15, 2023
#
# Objective: 
# Simple spectra for Varian linear accelerator photon beams: 4 MV, 6 MV, 10 MV, 15 MV or 18 MV
# for use in Topas (version 3.9) Monte-Carlo simulations.
#
# The spectra have been produced on the basis of Table 5 in the paper by Ali and Rogers:
#
#     E.S.M. Ali and D.W.O. Rogers:
#     Functional forms for photon spectra of clinical linacs 
#     Phys. Med. Biol. 57 (2012) 31–50.
#     doi:10.1088/0031-9155/57/1/31
#
# Example of use in a Topas parameter file:
#
#   includeFile = Topas-VarianBeamAR.txt
#   s:So/clanBeam/BeamEnergySpectrumType = "Continuous" # None, Continuous or Discrete
#
#   # Code for selection of spectra: VarianBeamxxMV where xx = 04, 06, 10, 15, or 18 
#   dv:So/clanBeam/BeamEnergySpectrumValues = So/VarianBeam04MV/BeamEnergySpectrumValues MeV
#   uv:So/clanBeam/BeamEnergySpectrumWeights = So/VarianBeam04MV/BeamEnergySpectrumWeights
############################################################################################



# 4 MV Varian photon spectrum generated using Ali and Rogers (AR) data
# See Phys. Med. Biol. 57 (2012) 31–50, Functional forms for photon spectra of clinical linacs
# Implemented by Claus E. Andersen, January 15, 2023
dv:So/VarianBeam04MV/BeamEnergySpectrumValues = 38 0.01 0.11 0.21 0.31 0.41 0.51 0.61 0.71 0.81 0.91 1.01 1.11 1.21 1.31 1.41 1.51 1.61 1.71 1.81 1.91 2.01 2.11 2.21 2.31 2.41 2.51 2.61 2.71 2.81 2.91 3.01 3.11 3.21 3.31 3.41 3.51 3.61 3.71 MeV
uv:So/VarianBeam04MV/BeamEnergySpectrumWeights = 38 0.0000000e+00 1.3705027e-22 3.1766449e-05 6.9704733e-03 3.1106497e-02 5.3682112e-02 6.6329988e-02 7.0903839e-02 7.0549054e-02 6.7529972e-02 6.3223239e-02 5.8417178e-02 5.3547973e-02 4.8847636e-02 4.4431070e-02 4.0346470e-02 3.6604475e-02 3.3195094e-02 3.0097560e-02 2.7286066e-02 2.4733077e-02 2.2411203e-02 2.0294216e-02 1.8357558e-02 1.6578552e-02 1.4936429e-02 1.3412267e-02 1.1988866e-02 1.0650607e-02 9.3832960e-03 8.1740130e-03 7.0109646e-03 5.8833474e-03 4.7812188e-03 3.6953787e-03 2.6172592e-03 1.5388222e-03 4.5246300e-04 


# 6 MV Varian photon spectrum generated using Ali and Rogers (AR) data
# See Phys. Med. Biol. 57 (2012) 31–50, Functional forms for photon spectra of clinical linacs
# Implemented by Claus E. Andersen, January 15, 2023
dv:So/VarianBeam06MV/BeamEnergySpectrumValues = 58 0.01 0.11 0.21 0.31 0.41 0.51 0.61 0.71 0.81 0.91 1.01 1.11 1.21 1.31 1.41 1.51 1.61 1.71 1.81 1.91 2.01 2.11 2.21 2.31 2.41 2.51 2.61 2.71 2.81 2.91 3.01 3.11 3.21 3.31 3.41 3.51 3.61 3.71 3.81 3.91 4.01 4.11 4.21 4.31 4.41 4.51 4.61 4.71 4.81 4.91 5.01 5.11 5.21 5.31 5.41 5.51 5.61 5.71 MeV

# 10 MV Varian photon spectrum generated using Ali and Rogers (AR) data
# See Phys. Med. Biol. 57 (2012) 31–50, Functional forms for photon spectra of clinical linacs
# Implemented by Claus E. Andersen, January 15, 2023

# Implemented by Claus E. Andersen, January 15, 2023

# 18 MV Varian photon spectrum generated using Ali and Rogers (AR) data
# See Phys. Med. Biol. 57 (2012) 31–50, Functional forms for photon spectra of clinical linacs
# Implemented by Claus E. Andersen, January 15, 2023
dv:So/VarianBeam18MV/BeamEnergySpectrumValues = 184 0.01 0.11 0.21 0.31 0.41 0.51 0.61 0.71 0.81 0.91 1.01 1.11 1.21 1.31 1.41 1.51 1.61 1.71 1.81 1.91 2.01 2.11 2.21 2.31 2.41 2.51 2.61 2.71 2.81 2.91 3.01 3.11 3.21 3.31 3.41 3.51 3.61 3.71 3.81 3.91 4.01 4.11 4.21 4.31 4.41 4.51 4.61 4.71 4.81 4.91 5.01 5.11 5.21 5.31 5.41 5.51 5.61 5.71 5.81 5.91 6.01 6.11 6.21 6.31 6.41 6.51 6.61 6.71 6.81 6.91 7.01 7.11 7.21 7.31 7.41 7.51 7.61 7.71 7.81 7.91 8.01 8.11 8.21 8.31 8.41 8.51 8.61 8.71 8.81 8.91 9.01 9.11 9.21 9.31 9.41 9.51 9.61 9.71 9.81 9.91 10.01 10.11 10.21 10.31 10.41 10.51 10.61 10.71 10.81 10.91 11.01 11.11 11.21 11.31 11.41 11.51 11.61 11.71 11.81 11.91 12.01 12.11 12.21 12.31 12.41 12.51 12.61 12.71 12.81 12.91 13.01 13.11 13.21 13.31 13.41 13.51 13.61 13.71 13.81 13.91 14.01 14.11 14.21 14.31 14.41 14.51 14.61 14.71 14.81 14.91 15.01 15.11 15.21 15.31 15.41 15.51 15.61 15.71 15.81 15.91 16.01 16.11 16.21 16.31 16.41 16.51 16.61 16.71 16.81 16.91 17.01 17.11 17.21 17.31 17.41 17.51 17.61 17.71 17.81 17.91 18.01 18.11 18.21 18.31 MeV
